error_header.en: Error during the Mobile ID login

descr_105.en: Mobile ID has not been ordered or is not activated for this subscriber number. Please visit http://swisscom.com/mobileid to activate your Mobile ID.

descr_208.en: Transaction Expiry date has been reached or Time out has elapsed. Please try again. If the error persists, contact Swisscom at http://swisscom.com/mobileid

descr_209.en: The service has not succeeded to contact the enduser's mobile equipment. (Bad connection...). Please try again. If the error persists, contact Swisscom at http://swisscom.com/mobileid

descr_401.en: The request has been canceled by the user. To complete the request it has to be accepted and confirmed with the Mobile ID PIN by the user. Additional information is available at http://swisscom.com/mobileid

descr_402.en: The Mobile ID PIN is blocked. Please visit http://swisscom.com/mobileid to reset your PIN.

descr_403.en: Your mobile subscription is blocked. To be able to use Mobile ID again, please contact your operator and reactivate your number.

descr_404.en: The subscriber number is not yet activated for Mobile ID. Please visit http://swisscom.com/mobileid to activate your Mobile ID.

descr_406.en: Error on the user device while confirming the request. Probably an other signature request is already in progress. Please try again. If the error persists, contact Swisscom at http://swisscom.com/mobileid

descr_422.en: Mobile ID has not been activated for this subscriber number. Please visit http://swisscom.com/mobileid to activate your Mobile ID.

descr_501.en: Verification error with the confirmation. Please visit http://swisscom.com/mobileid to reactivate your Mobile ID.

descr_503.en: Verification error with the confirmation. Please try again. If the error persists, contact Swisscom at http://swisscom.com/mobileid

descr_DEFAULT.en: Mobile ID can not be used at this time. Please try again. If the error persists, contact Swisscom at http://swisscom.com/mobileid

descr_.en: Mobile ID can not be used at this time. Please try again. If the error persists, contact Swisscom at http://swisscom.com/mobileid
